casebody.data:
<casebody firstpage="525" lastpage="525" xmlns="http://nrs.harvard.edu/urn-3:HLS.Libr.US_Case_Law.Schema.Case_Body:v1">
 <parties id="p-1">
  IN RE: E.D.
 </parties>
 <docketnumber id="p-2">
  125PA18-1
 </docketnumber>
 <court id="p-3">
  Supreme Court of North Carolina.
 </court>
 <decisiondate id="p-4">
  May 28, 2019
 </decisiondate>
 <attorneys id="p-5">
  Wyatt B. Orsbon, Assistant Appellant Defender, for E.D.
 </attorneys>
 <attorneys id="p-6">
  Glenn Gerding, Appellate Defender.
 </attorneys>
 <attorneys id="p-7">
  Robert T. Broughton, Assistant Attorney General, for State of North Carolina.
 </attorneys>
 <opinion id="p-8">
  The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 24th of May 2019 by Respondent to Stay the Mandate and Order Remand to Court of Appeals:
 </opinion>
 <opinion id="p-9">
  "Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 28th of May 2019."
 </opinion>
 <opinion type="majority">
  <author id="p-10">
   Davis, J. recused
  </author>
 </opinion>
</casebody>
